mapper.select: select i.staff_id,i.STAFF_NAME, count(t.travel_id) ct,COUNT(o.out_id) co, sum(r.late) sl,SUM(r.rest) sr, SUM(r.absenteeism) sa,sum(r.work_unregistered) su,SUM(r.work_off) so, SUM(r.attendance_should) sas,SUM(r.attendance_actual) saa from staff_info i left JOIN travel t on i.staff_id=t.sta_staff_id left join work_register r on i.staff_id=r.staff_id left join hr_go_out o on i.staff_id=o.sta_staff_id group by i.staff_id,i.staff_name order by i.staff_id asc
